message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You could have gotten 500k, now I'm taking more. Don't expect a better offer next time!
You took a big chunk, now it's my turn to negotiate!
You wanted to negotiate, now you'll get peanuts. Take it or leave it!
You're getting greedy, but I'll give you a slightly better deal
You're getting desperate, but I'm not giving up yet. Take it or leave it!
You're really squeezing me now, but I'll give you a slightly better deal
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience. Take it or leave it, it's your last chance!
You're really pushing me to the limit, but I'll give you one more chance
You're my last chance to get something. Take it or leave it, I don't care anymore!
You're really trying to lowball me, but I'll give you one more chance
I'm not leaving without getting something. Take it, or we both walk away with nothing!
